"A.P.241/4/2/15:00": "Now then, since we've analyzed various pieces of intel, let's decide our course of action from here."
"Is that... alright? Having such a laid-back plan?"
"All we know is that our enemy's targeting Aru as their motive. The best we can do is to protect him and watch how they act."
"We're not fighting Darkers this time, but humans. It's not advised to move hastily. There's nothing else that we can do."
"Therefore, I recommend Hitsugi and Aru to be finished with any plans that you have on your mind."
"Once the situation starts to move, it's not likely that you'll have time for leisure."
"Things I wanted to do, plans I have in mind..."
"Speaking of which, you have an older brother, right? Hitsugi, shouldn't you contact them?"
"Eh- Yes, I do have one, but... how did you know that?"
"Ah- uhh... I kind of guessed! You just had a look of having an older brother, or so I figured."
"I guess you're right. It'll be bothersome for my big bro if I don't talk to him. I wonder if there's a way to contact him..."
"Well, what are you waiting for? You can go there directly. Am I right, <%me>?"
"Eh... No, but- I thought you said that we're on standby."
"That's the plan for ARKS. Since you're our guests, we have no reason to stop you."
"Don't hesitate, Hitsugi. Both family members and siblings should be met personally. And of course, we're here to fully support you."
"Thank you, both of you. Well then, I'll meet up with him for a bit. I'm leaving the support to you."
